query.prompt:
This text is written in Interlingua. Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Lemma, Part of Speech, Tense, Mood and Note.
* Decompose the contraction in Lemma. * Leave blank if not applicable. * Words linked by an apostrophe should be separated. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded. Apostrophes in contractions are not quotation marks. * If the verb and the other word are combined, they should be separated by Lemma. In such cases, only the verb information should be written in the other columns.
1 In le medio del cammino de nostre vita 9 dicera del altere cosas que io ibi habeva vidite. 28 Postea que io habeva pausate un poco le corpore lasse,
query.result: | Word | Lemma | Part of Speech | Tense | Mood | Note | |---|---|---|---|---|---| | In | in | preposition | | | | | le | le | definite article | | | | | medio | medio | noun | | | | | del | de | preposition | | | | | cammino | cammino | noun | | | | | de | de | preposition | | | | | nostre | nostro | adjective | | | | | vita | vita | noun | | | | | dicera | dicere | verb | imperfect | indicative | | | del | de | preposition | | | | | altere | altere | adjective | | | | | cosas | cosa | noun | | | | | que | que | conjunction | | | | | io | io | pronoun | | | | | ibi | ibi | adverb | | | | | habeva | habere | verb | imperfect | indicative | | | vidite | videre | verb | perfect | indicative | | | Postea | postea | adverb | | | | | que | que | conjunction | | | | | io | io | pronoun | | | | | habeva | habere | verb | imperfect | indicative | | | pausate | pausare | verb | perfect | participle | | | un | un | indefinite article | | | | | poco | poco | adverb | | | | | le | le | definite article | | | | | corpore | corpore | noun | | | | | lasse | lasso | adjective | | | |

query.prompt:
Create a word table.
1 In le medio del cammino de nostre vita 2 me trovava per un silva obscur, 3 que le directe via era perdite.

query.prompt:
Create a word table.
4 Ah quamto a dicer qual era es cosa dur 5 iste silva salvage e aspre e forte 6 que in le pensamento renova le paura!

query.prompt:
Create a word table.
7 Tanto es amara que poco es plus morte; 8 ma pro tractar del ben que io ibi trovava, 9 dicera del altere cosas que io ibi habeva vidite.
